qal hdha almumin aldhy 'udkhl aljanat lashabh: hal 'antum muttalewn linaraa masir dhlk alqryn? fatalae fraa qarinuh fi wasat alnar

qal almumin lqrynh almunkar llbeth: laqad qarbt 'ana thlkny bsdk 'iyay ean al'iiman law atetk. walawla fadl rabiy bhdayty 'iilaa al'iiman wtthbyty elyh, lakunt min almuhdarin fi aleadhab mek

ahqana 'anana mkhlladwn mneeamwn, fama nahn bimayitin 'iilaa mawtatana al'uwlaa fi aldnya, wama nahn bmedhdhabyn baed dkhwlna aljn? 'inn ma nahn fih min naeim lhu alzzafar alezym
ahqana 'anana mkhlladwn mneeamwn, fama nahn bimayitin 'iilaa mawtatana al'uwlaa fi aldnya, wama nahn bmedhdhabyn baed dkhwlna aljn? 'inn ma nahn fih min naeim lhu alzzafar alezym
ahqana 'anana mkhlladwn mneeamwn, fama nahn bimayitin 'iilaa mawtatana al'uwlaa fi aldnya, wama nahn bmedhdhabyn baed dkhwlna aljn? 'inn ma nahn fih min naeim lhu alzzafar alezym
lmthl hdha alnaeim alkaml, walkhlwd aldaym, walfawz alezym, falyaemal aleamilun fi aldnya; lysyru 'iilayh fi alakhrt
adhlk aldhy sabaq wasafah min naeim aljanat khayr dyaft weta' min allh, 'am shajarat alzaquwm alkhbytht almlewnt, taeam 'ahl alnar?
'ina jaealnaha fitnatan afttn biha alzaalimun lanfshm bialkufr walmeasy, waqaluu mstnkryn: 'iina sahibukum yunabiyukum 'ana fi alnaar shjrt, walnaar takul alshjr

'inha shajaratan tanbut fi qaer jhnm, thmrha qbyh almanzar ka'anah ruuws alshyatyn, fa'iidha kanat kdhlk fala tasal baed hdha ean temha, fa'iina almushrikin lakilun min tilk alshajarat famaliuwn minha btwnhm. thuma 'iinahum baed al'ukul minha lsharbwn shrabana khlytana qbyhana harrana, thuma 'iina mrddahm baed hdha aleadhab 'iilaa eadhab alnar

wlqd dll ean alhaqu qabl qawmak -ayha alrswl- 'akthar al'umam alsabqt
wlqd 'arsalna fi tilk al'umam mursilin andhrwhm bialeadhab fkfru
ftammal kayf kanat nihayat tilk al'umam alty andhrt, fkfrt? faqad eudhdhibt, wasarat lilnaas ebrt
'ila eibad allah aladhin akhlshm allh, wkhssahm birahmatih l'ikhlashm lh
wlqd nadana nbyna nwh; lnnsrh ealaa qwmh, falaniem almujibun lah nhn
wnjynah wa'ahlah walmuminin maeah min 'adhaan almshrkyn, wamin algharaq baltwfan alezym
